channel.title: microblaze on QY's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in microblaze on QY's Notes

item.title: Microblaze1 Hello World LED
item.description: 1 Introduction This post is a step-by-step guide implementing a blinking LED project with MicroBlaze: Create a minimal MicroBlaze project Sample code for blinking LED (based on a Xilinx demo) Implementation on the demo board I am new to FPGA and MicroBlaze, and I learned these all from the tutorials I found. References are at the end. I used: Device: xc7a35tfgg484-2, (an Artix-7 Mini board made by a Chinese company, Wildfire) Vivado 2018.
